newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Lippo Life to buy Lippo Bank stake.
newsitem.headline: Lippo Life to buy Lippo Bank stake.

text.p: Indonesia's PT Asuransi Lippo Life said on Wednesday it planned to buy 40.15 percent of the shares of PT Lippo Bank worth 657.83 billion rupiah.
Lippo Life said in a statement that the insurance firm expected to strengthen its marketing network by using Lippo Bank's extensive branch network.
Lippo Life said the planned share purchase was subject to shareholders' approval scheduled on September 27, 1996.
Lippo Life said it expected to finance the purchase using 100 billion rupiah of internal funds and 557.83 billion rupiah in loans.
The share purchase will increase Lippo Life's stake in the bank to 44.57 percent from the existing 4.42 percent.
Both Lippo Life and Lippo Bank are members of the widely diversified conglomerate the Lippo Group.
